rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 24 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 7:52 AM, 18 June 2025(Wednesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Rizal, Batangas, Zambales and Laguna within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Nueva Ecija(Gabaldon, General Tinio), Quezon(Panukulan, Burdeos, General Nakar), Bataan(Bagac, Mariveles) and Bulacan(Dona Remedios Trinidad) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
